navigation_goal: Navigate to this FINN.no job search results page. FIRST: If you see a cookie consent banner or 'Godta' button, click it to dismiss the banner. THEN: Scroll down the page to load all job listings. If there's a 'Last inn flere' (Load more) button at the bottom, click it to load more jobs. Repeat loading more until no more jobs can be loaded or you've scrolled 5 times.
data_extraction_goal: Extract ALL job listings visible on the page after dismissing any cookie banners and loading all content. For EACH job listing card/item on the page, extract: Job title (exact text), Company name, Location (city/region), Full URL to the job posting (must be complete URL starting with https://www.finn.no/), Short description if visible, Posted date if shown (e.g. '2 dager siden'), and FINNKODE if visible.

jobs.description: List of all job postings found on the search results page

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: Job title as shown on the listing card

attributes.name: url
attributes.description: Full URL to job posting (must be complete URL starting with https://)

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Short job description or summary visible on card

attributes.name: posted_date
attributes.description: When the job was posted (e.g. '2 dager siden')

error_code_mapping.NO_JOBS_FOUND: No job listings found on the page
error_code_mapping.LOAD_MORE_FAILED: Failed to load additional job listings
error_code_mapping.EXTRACTION_FAILED: Failed to extract job data from page
